original_text: That at what time ye hear the sound of the cornet, flute, harp, sackbut, psaltery, dulcimer, and all kinds of musick, ye fall down and worship the golden image that Nebuchadnezzar the king hath set up:
korean_text: 너희는 나팔과 피리와 수금과 삼현금과 양금과 생황과 및 모든 악기 소리를 들을 때에 엎드리어 느부갓네살 왕이 세운 금 신상에게 절하라

sentences.original_text: at what time ye hear the sound
of the cornet, flute, harp, sackbut, psaltery, dulcimer
sentences.korean_translation: 나팔, 피리, 하프, 사크바트, 비파, 덜시머의

sentences.original_text: that Nebuchadnezzar the king hath set up
